title: Roots (feat. Amanda Fondell)
lyrics:
I remember when my eyes were blue
Care for when I looked at you
Like the world were laying at my feet
It was so easy
It was so easy

But I shifted colors

I'm on the road for long periods

Stay civil been longer

It was so easy

Living's so easy



I told myself

Transfer to the place where I belong

I told myself

Find a way to get the

Back to all that matters



I remember how they used to say

Stay a child as long as these two can

You're my garden not a thing will change

It was so easy

Living's so easy



But I shifted colors

I'm on the road for long periods

Stay civil been longer

It was so easy

Living's so easy



I told myself

Transfer to the place where I belong

I told myself

Find a way to get the

Back to all that matters



(Ooh)

(Back to myself)

(Back to myself)



Back to myself

Transfer to the place where I belong

Back to my clouds

Find a way to get the

Back to all that matters
